definition: to publish (in newspapers or magazines)/to record (bookkeeping entries)

to scale (a height)/to ascend/to mount/to publish or record/to enter (e.g. in a register)/to press down with the foot/to step or tread on/to put on (shoes or trousers) (dialect)/to be gathered and taken to the threshing ground (old)
to carry/to convey/to load/to hold/to fill up/and/also/as well as/simultaneously
to record in writing/to carry (i.e. publish in a newspaper etc)/Taiwan pr. [zai4]/year

sentences.english: Of course, such data did not appear in “This is Japan”.
sentences.chinese: 当然，这些数据并没有在《这就是日本》上面登载。

sentences.english: The full list can be seen at www.forbes.com.
sentences.chinese: 完整榜单登载在福布斯网站上。

sentences.english: His poems and articles have been adopted by many anthologies and dictionaries in China.
sentences.chinese: 诗文成果名录被多种选集和辞书登载。

sentences.english: The full list can be seen at www.forbes.com。
sentences.chinese: 完整榜单登载在福布斯网站上。

sentences.english: The study was published in the Journal of Pragmatics.
sentences.chinese: 研究登载于‘语学日报’上。

sentences.english: Their report appears in the Aug. 28 issue of Nature.
sentences.chinese: 他们的报告登载在八月28期的《自然》杂志上。

sentences.english: The newspapers gave prominent coverage to the news.
sentences.chinese: 各报在显著位置上登载了这条消息。

sentences.english: On the contrary, the content of the Short Story Magazine did not be altered and its quality was on the decline.
sentences.chinese: 而此时的《小说月报》保持登载内容不变，质量下降。

sentences.english: Recruitment information will be in the network, such as media advertising column contains power.
sentences.chinese: 招聘信息将在网络等电力媒体广告栏登载。

sentences.english: The press carried his avowal throughout the country.
sentences.chinese: 全国的报纸登载了他承认的消息。

sentences.english: The research is published today in the Proceedings of the Royal Society B.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究今天登载在《皇家科学纪录汇编》B刊上。

sentences.english: The minutes of their meeting were fully transcribed in the bulletin.
sentences.chinese: 他们的会议记录详尽地登载在会刊中。

sentences.english: What characterizes almost all newspapers and magazines is the excess of commercials.
sentences.chinese: 几乎所有报刊杂志都登载了太多商业广告。

sentences.english: The questionnaire and findings will also be accessible on the study's Web site.
sentences.chinese: 问卷和调查结果也将登载在研究组的网页上。

sentences.english: The State protects the lawful rights and interests of Internet websites regarding the engagement in news publication services.
sentences.chinese: 国家保护互联网站从事登载新闻业务的合法权益。

sentences.english: The findings are described in the Journal of the American Society for Horticultural Science.
sentences.chinese: 这项发现被美国园艺学协会日报所登载。

Sina, Chinese web portal and online media company
to carry a story/to publish (in a newspaper or magazine)
newspapers and periodicals/the press

to publish
Dagong Bao, popular newspaper name/Ta Kung Pao, newspaper founded 1902 in Beijing, now published in Hong Kong
piece of writing submitted for publication/manuscript/article
publication
to publish/to appear (in print)
announcement (written, on billboard, letter, newspaper or website)/to post information/a notice
newspaper/newsprint/CL:份[fen4],期[qi1],張|张[zhang1]
to issue/to publish

disclaimer
